segments.text: I notice the girl standing so patiently, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are full of hope, and it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, but he’s determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear them giggling as they sneak treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely focused on her dishes, missing all the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the light from the window makes everything look so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting, but no one’s paying attention to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a snapshot of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could join them and grab a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the girl reaches up makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR
